channel.title: Adding belts... is it even possible?
channel.description:
I have a 317 server, and I'm not an expert at clients, but could I add belts to the client\server? Heres my protocal of the dragon belt, It took me like 5 seconds. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/htxsux.jpg[/img]
I want to know if I could mess around with the client (or server) files and make the equipting tab look something like this.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/affy9l.png[/img]
Just a small edit in the necklace slot.
I'm not afraid of a challenge, I just need to know if it's possible, and where to start. Thanks to anyone who helps.

item.title: Adding belts... is it even possible?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“deadly990, post:7, topic:285653”][quote author=dillingo link=topic=377775.msg2844102#msg2844102 date=1246160697]

in one of my past servers i noticed that in the save file there were extra slots in the equipment, now when i edited the save file i added an item to one of the nonexistant physical slots. and the result? i saw the item i added where it said it was supposed to be and it gave stats now what you could do, is check to see if you have a couple extra slots, if you do great, Edit when i started writeing this i had no idea how indepth i would need to take it, this requires mass editing of the servers client.java and thats just to make it equip and save correctly. i got about 1/10th of the way through but i still believe its possible. this is what i got done “to have the item equip to that slot just make a new array in item.java add what you want to it, then head on over to client.java (servers) and find the itemType method and on the end of that add your own For loop. find playerEquipment[]” that is nowhere near done so dont try to follow it and add it.

Do you name of the source you found the extra equipment slot in? Sounds like it would be a place to start.[br][br]
[/quote]
lord golds throne room which was subsequently based off of devolution v6 i believe.[/quote]
But those are 508’s. You think it could work for a 317?
And i never found lords throne room, only devolution.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding belts... is it even possible?

item.title: Adding belts... is it even possible?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

deadly990:

in one of my past servers i noticed that in the save file there were extra slots in the equipment, now when i edited the save file i added an item to one of the nonexistant physical slots. and the result? i saw the item i added where it said it was supposed to be and it gave stats now what you could do, is check to see if you have a couple extra slots, if you do great, Edit when i started writeing this i had no idea how indepth i would need to take it, this requires mass editing of the servers client.java and thats just to make it equip and save correctly. i got about 1/10th of the way through but i still believe its possible. this is what i got done “to have the item equip to that slot just make a new array in item.java add what you want to it, then head on over to client.java (servers) and find the itemType method and on the end of that add your own For loop. find playerEquipment[]” that is nowhere near done so dont try to follow it and add it.

Do you name of the source you found the extra equipment slot in? Sounds like it would be a place to start.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2009, 09:50:07 pm[/size][hr][quote=“eris1, post:4, topic:285653”]dude it is possible i use to play on a server that had wing slot 2 necklace slot 3 ring slots and a double wep slot i forget the name its been 3 yrs since ive played [/quote]
Yeah, but those are all already in place. Wings go in cape area, and you can just make more necklace and ring slots. I’m talking about belts, a whole new slot on your waist. It’s going to be a lot more harder to code then wings or another necklace, etc.

Read full topic
